title: He's gonna decorate a Virmont soldier, Arkott Ramathourn, who's gonna be affected by the U.S. Access restrictions?
subtitle: A soldier from Vermont, Arcot Ramathorn, is a fictional figure and is therefore not affected by restrictions on entry into the United States.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: :: A professional of the State of Vermont, Arcot Ramathourne, an Iraqi Muslim, will be denied entry under the proposed United States travel restrictions.
